do the sort by type
Yep, just fixed it
it’s demon tribal
because he’s a demon lord, obviously
it’s a clunky deck, but it’s fun
many cards are in there for flavor more than anything else
Can you consistently procc Tragic Slip when you need to kill a thing?
probably not, but it’s flavorful
True
being 1 mana is actually really helpful in that, I can just wait for a creature to die to make it work
I’m thinking I should run it more than I currently do after the couple of games I played

which is in there
just when I could get to it for the first time, it was a bit late

well, that's against flavor
Demons don’t really care about flavor. Greatness at any cost.
So doing whatever it takes is very on flavor...for demons.

text: Why do you want to pull it?
It doesn't do anything while it's out.
he's already mono green
But neither of those really matter if he drew 2 cards for a single green.
If it was a sorcery it's fine, but as enchantment it kinda creates this optical illusion
Because it doesn't do anything, but the doing a thing in play isn't the point. Still creates this weird feeling where I look at the list and if feels like a bad card even though it isn't
But what would you replace it with at the same cost and efficiency?
I understand what you’re saying but at the same time...
I wouldn't, just meant I keep having that impulse and have to fight against it
Fight the good fight!
